titleStmt.title: Four Fragments of an unknown tragedy by Euripides

availability.p: © Digital Corpus of Literary Papyri. This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 License .

encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Finalized - This is good to go.
Finalized - This is good to go.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Be sure to manually encode dots as per Paul’s submission notes; fr. 1 i.3 should be lost.1lin; correct to *middot* throughout; fr. 1 ii.1 and fr. 1 ii.8 >> *apostrophe*; fr. 1 ii.2 should be |corr| instead of |reg|; add scribal acute in fr. 1 ii.14; add space to end of fr. 2.1; in fr. 2.5 place .1 inside |reg|; fr. 2.6 should be vac.1lin; in fr. 2.9 add nu after .1 at start of line; at start of fr. 2.10 that’s a scribal circumflex over a lacunose letter (not a high-punctus); add readings for fr. 3.3-4. META: Euripides is CWKB 2286; remove vol.# from biblio 73274 and make number 953f; 68948 should be 21231 ‘number’ 77; add 73362 p.218 and 77272 pp.260-261; image link is (http://163.1.169.40/gsdl/collect/POxy/index/assoc/HASH01cb/e43ec89d.dir/POxy.v0068.n4639.a.01.hires.jpg); add period to MP3 number; Oxyrhynchus is Pleiades (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736983); Oxyrhynchites is Pleiades (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736982);

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Be sure to manually encode dots as per Paul’s submission notes; fr. 1 i.3 should be lost.1lin; correct to *middot* throughout; fr. 1 ii.1 and fr. 1 ii.8 >> *apostrophe*; fr. 1 ii.2 should be |corr| instead of |reg|; add scribal acute in fr. 1 ii.14; add space to end of fr. 2.1; in fr. 2.5 place .1 inside |reg|; fr. 2.6 should be vac.1lin; in fr. 2.9 add nu after .1 at start of line; at start of fr. 2.10 that’s a scribal circumflex over a lacunose letter (not a high-punctus); add readings for fr. 3.3-4. META: Euripides is CWKB 2286; remove vol.# from biblio 73274 and make number 953f; 68948 should be 21231 ‘number’ 77; add 73362 p.218 and 77272 pp.260-261; image link is (http://163.1.169.40/gsdl/collect/POxy/index/assoc/HASH01cb/e43ec89d.dir/POxy.v0068.n4639.a.01.hires.jpg); add period to MP3 number; Oxyrhynchus is Pleiades (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736983); Oxyrhynchites is Pleiades (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736982);

Submit - Encoded Greek text from P.Oxy.68. 4639 = TM 68948. Leiden+ breaks fr.1.2.1 ἐᾶτε scribal perispomenon + underdot, fr.1.2.2 ὑβρίζειν spiritus asper + diaeresis, fr.1.2.8 ἕρπ scribal spiritus asper + underdot, fr.1.2.10 παρῆ scribal perispomenon + underdot, fr.1.2.14 εἶά scribal spiritus lenis + perispomenon.

Submit - Encoded Greek text from P.Oxy.68. 4639 = TM 68948. Leiden+ breaks fr.1.2.1 ἐᾶτε scribal perispomenon + underdot, fr.1.2.2 ὑβρίζειν spiritus asper + diaeresis, fr.1.2.8 ἕρπ scribal spiritus asper + underdot, fr.1.2.10 παρῆ scribal perispomenon + underdot, fr.1.2.14 εἶά scribal spiritus lenis + perispomenon.
